name: Gold Pivot
short_description: It calculates the proportion of the previous candle, for example if you choose Daily you will have the proportion of the previous day's pivot at 61.8.

params.title: Gold Pivot x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Time Frame
params.content: The time frame with which to calculate the pivot

params.title: Candle Show
params.content: The number of candles to be displayed according to the chosen time frame

params.title: Show Label ?
params.content: You can choose not to display the labels

params.title: Line Style
params.content: The type of line to be drawn on the graph

params.title: Tickness
params.content: The thickness of the line to be drawn
